section.title: Upgrading from blojsom 1.9.4 to blojsom 1.9.5
section.p: Add the following parameter, blog-trackbacks-enabled with a value of true to /WEB-INF/blojsom.properties if you want to keep trackbacks enabled on your blog.

section.title: Upgrading from blojsom 1.9.3 to blojsom 1.9.4
section.p: If you are using the MetaWeblog API handler for blojsom, there are 3 parameters you'll need to add to /WEB-INF/blojsom.properties. blojsom-extension-metaweblog-upload-directory: location where files can be uploaded through the newMediaObject method blojsom-extension-metaweblog-accepted-types: comma-separated list of mime-types accepted for the newMediaObject method blojsom-extension-metaweblog-static-url-prefix: url prefix used to generate the return URL for the newMediaObject method
